author: wsmoak
msg: Modified build to include DTD, LICENSE and NOTICE.
Added resources directory for DTD (which will be moved from core.)

author: dims
msg: - With this checkin m:rebuild-all works properly
- Basically magicGBall uses the maven deployment plugin, making it explicit here.
- Cleanup a few names in modules/*/project.xml
- replace install with install-now in doInstall for plugins.

Notes: Basically the old plugin was getting installed (picked up from some remote maven repo) and switching the order ensures that depolyment plugin is built and installed before it is used anywhere. also the install-now option adds the plugin for instant use (not a subsequent run)

author: crossley
msg: This workaround removes the default namespace from site.xml
before the Cocoon input modules read it.
